changeSet.author: manchikr
changeSet.sql: CREATE TYPE typ_pos_validate_fields AS (is_user_id BOOLEAN, is_validate_fld BOOLEAN, is_item_id BOOLEAN, is_tmplt_desc BOOLEAN, is_trgt_co BOOLEAN, is_acct_number BOOLEAN, is_default_amt BOOLEAN, is_control_1 BOOLEAN, is_productivity BOOLEAN, is_control_2 BOOLEAN, is_stat_cnt BOOLEAN, is_post_desc BOOLEAN);
CREATE TYPE typ_post_fml_flags AS (is_post_fml_pct BOOLEAN, is_post_fml_co BOOLEAN, is_post_fml_acct BOOLEAN, is_post_fml_bal_flag BOOLEAN);

CREATE TYPE typ_recr_validate_fields AS (is_user_id BOOLEAN, is__validate_fld BOOLEAN, is__recur_tmplt_id BOOLEAN, is__begin_date BOOLEAN, is__end_date BOOLEAN, is__rev_annv_day BOOLEAN, is__je_desc BOOLEAN, is__trgt_co BOOLEAN, is__acct_number BOOLEAN, is__post_fml_flag BOOLEAN, is__default_amt BOOLEAN, is__post_fml_pct BOOLEAN, is__post_fml_co BOOLEAN, is__post_fml_acct BOOLEAN, is__post_fml_bal_flag BOOLEAN, is__control1 BOOLEAN, is__productivity BOOLEAN, is__control2 BOOLEAN, is__stat_cnt BOOLEAN, is__post_desc BOOLEAN, is__last_post_upd BOOLEAN, is__last_user_id BOOLEAN);
CREATE TYPE typ_control AS (control_id UUID, control_notes TEXT,control_type ENM_CTRL_TYPE);
CREATE TYPE typ_post_distr_details AS (chart_accounts_fk UUID ,allocation_percents DECIMAL(6,4));
CREATE TYPE typ_po_ship_info AS ( ship_via_id TEXT, tracking_nbr TEXT, est_delivery_date DATE, est_freight_amt MONEY, ship_address UUID);

changeSet.sql: CREATE CONSTRAINT TRIGGER trg_tbl_tenant_insert_after AFTER INSERT ON tbl_tenant FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE fn_create_tenant(); END_TBL_TALENT_TRG_INS_AFT
changeSet.rollback: DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trg_tbl_tenant_insert_after ON tbl_tenant;

changeSet.author: manchikr
changeSet.sql: CREATE TRIGGER trg_tbl_sale_chain_before_insert BEFORE INSERT ON tbl_sale_chain FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE tr_fn_chk_act_type(); TRG_TBL_SALE_CHAIN_BFR_INS
changeSet.rollback: DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS trg_tbl_sale_chain_before_insert ON tbl_sale_chain;
